question: Once resources are organized, the next step is to properly ________ tasks among employees.
Task allotment involves breaking down work into different ________.
Tasks should be assigned to workers based on their ________.
Establishing a chain of command helps in defining who ________ to whom.
Promoting teamwork ensures that employees work together ________.
Monitoring tasks helps in determining if they need to be ________.
In a construction company, engineers are responsible for ________ the building.
Workers in a construction company are responsible for laying ________ and mixing cement.
Electricians in a construction company are responsible for installing ________.
Supervisors in a construction company ensure that everything happens ________.
In a school, teachers are assigned subjects based on their ________.
Administrative staff in a school handle ________ and fees.
The principal in a school oversees the entire system to ensure ________ functioning.
Establishing relationships among workers helps prevent ________ about roles and responsibilities.
Clear relationships among workers encourage ________ and cooperation.
Defining clear reporting structures helps in ________ decision-making.
Clear roles and responsibilities reduce ________ by defining a structured hierarchy.
At the supervisory level, organizing ensures that physical resources and human skills are ________ aligned.
A supervisor must organize physical resources to ensure a ________ workflow.
Matching employee skills with job needs helps in ________ productivity.
Allotting tasks and establishing relationships helps create a ________ and cooperative work environment.
When tasks are properly assigned and relationships are established, organizations run ________.
Proper task allotment and relationship establishment help employees remain ________.
Efficient task allotment and relationship establishment help achieve business goals ________.
Task allotment involves breaking down work into manageable ________.
Assigning tasks based on skills helps in ________ employee performance.
Establishing a clear chain of command helps in defining ________ structures.
Promoting teamwork ensures that employees collaborate ________.
Monitoring tasks helps in determining if adjustments are needed to ________ them.
In a construction company, engineers are responsible for designing the ________.
Workers in a construction company are responsible for laying ________ and mixing cement.
Electricians in a construction company are responsible for installing ________ systems.
Supervisors in a construction company ensure that everything happens according to the ________.
In a school, teachers are assigned subjects based on their ________ to ensure effective teaching.
Administrative staff in a school handle ________ and fees to maintain records.
The principal in a school oversees the entire system to ensure ________ operations.
Establishing clear relationships among workers helps prevent ________ and confusion.
Clear roles and responsibilities encourage ________ among team members.
Defining clear reporting structures helps in making ________ decisions.
Clear roles and responsibilities reduce ________ by establishing a structured hierarchy.
At the supervisory level, organizing ensures that physical resources and human skills are ________ aligned to achieve goals.
A supervisor must organize physical resources to ensure a ________ workflow and efficient operations.
Matching employee skills with job needs helps in ________ overall productivity.
Allotting tasks and establishing relationships helps create a ________ work environment that fosters collaboration.
When tasks are properly assigned and relationships are established, organizations operate ________.
Proper task allotment and relationship establishment help employees remain ________ and motivated.
Efficient task allotment and relationship establishment help achieve business goals ________ and effectively.
Task allotment involves breaking down work into manageable ________ to enhance productivity.
Assigning tasks based on skills helps in ________ employee performance and job satisfaction.
Establishing a clear chain of command helps in defining effective ________ structures for decision-making.
